heading: Today
text: Numerous snow showers for the higher terrain north, a dusting to 2 inches, becoming scattered and mixed with rain in northern valleys and southern mountains.  Mostly cloudy south and east.  Highs in the 30s to near 40 north, 40 to 45 south.  Winds light, becoming west to northwest up to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy, with scattered snow showers north, numerous over the higher terrain, the highest elevations seeing a dusting to 2 inches.  Lows in the 20s.  Winds becoming northwest 10 to 15 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly cloudy north, with scattered snow showers, mostly over the higher terrain, and some breaks of sun.  Periods of sunshine south, sunniest in southern valleys.  Highs in the low to mid 30s north, near 40 south.  Northwest winds 5 to 15 mph.
